snippet.title: Heretic's Fork - Official The Savior's Descent Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the latest Heretic's Fork trailer for a look at the deckbuilding tower defense roguelike game's new update, The Savior's Descent. This free major update introduces several quality of life enhancements, including save slots and mid-run saves, full controller support, endless mode optimization, new music, and more. Heretic's Fork is available to play on PC (Steam).

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
